price: (99) And We have certainly revealed to you verses [which are] clear proofs, and no one would deny them except the defiantly disobedient.
arabic: وَلَقَدۡ أَنزَلۡنَآ إِلَيۡكَ ءَايَٰتِۭ بَيِّنَٰتٖۖ وَمَا يَكۡفُرُ بِهَآ إِلَّا ٱلۡفَٰسِقُونَ

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: walaqad anzalnā ilayka āyātin bayyinātin wamā yakfuru bihā illā al-fāsiqūna
